message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me at that price?
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $110.
I appreciate the willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Can you consider that?
I understand that you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further and sell the product to you for $108.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit higher than $108. How about $106?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $109.
I'm still a bit away from my target price. How about $107?
I'm getting close to my limit, Bob. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $110.
I'm not willing to go above $108. This is my final offer. Can you meet me at $108?
